We support MacOS, iOS, and iPadOS.
If you are contributing code, please ensure your changes work across all supported platforms.

In `MusicSheetsCopilot/Views/MultiPageSVGMusicSheetView.swift`, there's a `WebView` that displays the SVG music sheet rendered by Verovio. The JavaScript side has a util function `logToSwiftSide` that sends log messages to the Swift side for logging debug info.
